markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Mix Couatl](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1104)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Mix couatls (pronounced “meesh”) are guides to fledgling societies, providing fundamental information such as farming techniques, medicinal expertise, or more esoteric knowledge like the arcane arts.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Couatl_MixCouatl.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Mix Couatl](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1104)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Couatl" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=298" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 56</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +18, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +21, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +18, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +4

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Star Child** The mix couatl is difficult to discern against starry skies. The mix couatl can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) in the air at night without cover or being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 135

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+9 piercing plus mix couatl venom and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189)
- **2nd**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only), [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)
- **3rd**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will)
- **4th**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self only)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  2d10+4 bludgeoning, DC 26

**Gift of Knowledge**   When a mix couatl casts [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) on a willing creature, the mix couatl can Sustain the Spell to modify memories for up to 60 continuous minutes. A mix couatl can grant knowledge of a particular skill to the target as part of the spell. The mix couatl chooses Engineering [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), Farming Lore, Fishing Lore, Hunting Lore, or Mercantile Lore. The target becomes permanently trained in the chosen skill. A creature can benefit from Gift of Knowledge only once.

**Mix Couatl Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A mix couatl's venom deals good damage rather than poison damage to [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70); **Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage, [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36), and stupefied 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d8 poison damage, stunned 1, and stupefied 2 (1 round)

**Wrap in Coils** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The mix couatl has a Medium or smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in their jaws; **Effect** The mix couatl moves the creature into their coils, freeing their jaws to make attacks, then uses Constrict against the creature. The mix couatl can hold as many creatures in their coils as will fit in their space.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-128" />
name: Mix Couatl
